Comments_List: How to do microeconomics and approach questions from a marginal cost/benefit analysis perspective
I think it was a pretty well rounded course overall.  It was well designed to convey the material and had ample time for exploration and tangential questions.
Yes, Professor Simons will answer your questions instantly. Having a seminar econ intro class made it faster to find a study group too.
Would highly recommends.  Professor Simons is a wonderful and patient teacher, and everyone should understand at least basic micro
